sc.fiji.snt

Class SearchThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • sc.fiji.snt.SearchThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, SearchInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FillerThread, TracerThread

    public abstract class SearchThread
extends java.lang.Thread
implements SearchInterface
    Implements a common thread that explores the image using a variety of strategies, e.g., to trace tubular structures or surfaces.
    Author:
    Mark Longair, Tiago Ferreira
